sentences.sContent: This invention of cereal song adduce cries " hippo water platen ".
sentences.sContent_eng: This invention of cereal song adduce cries " hippo water platen ".
sentences.sCn: 谷歌举出的这个发明叫“河马水滚筒”。

remMethod.val: ad (做) + duc (引导) + e → 举例做引导 → 举出 (例证)

words.tran: 引用，引证；内转；内收作用

trans.tranOther: to give facts or reasons in order to prove that something is true
